title: Even as Challenges Mount, Europeans Stick by Ukraine
description: Inflation and anxiety over nuclear weapons may be eating into some popular support for the war, but key governments remain insulated from the pressures for now.
dc:creator: Jason Horowitz and Catherine Porter
media:credit: Finbarr Oâ€™Reilly for The New York Times
media:description: The funeral of a Ukrainian soldier who was killed last month by Russian artillery was held on Thursday in Kharkiv, Ukraine. European support for Ukraine remains high after eight months of war.
